name: Image Compressor
description: Reduce file size while maintaining quality. Perfect for web optimization and storage savings.

name: Format Converter
description: Convert between JPG, PNG, WebP, and BMP formats instantly with high quality output.

name: PDF Merger
description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single document with drag-and-drop ordering.

name: PDF Splitter
description: Extract specific pages or split PDF into multiple files by page ranges.

name: Base64 Encoder
description: Encode text or files to Base64 format for data transmission and storage.

name: Base64 Decoder
description: Decode Base64 strings back to original text or download as files.

name: Image Resizer
description: Resize images by percentage, pixels, or preset dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio.

name: PDF to Images
description: Convert PDF pages to high-quality JPG or PNG images for easy sharing.

name: Text Counter
description: Count characters, words, paragraphs, and analyze text statistics instantly.

name: QR Code Generator
description: Generate QR codes for text, URLs, or data with customizable size and format options.

name: Color Palette Extractor
description: Extract dominant colors from images to create beautiful color palettes.

name: URL Shortener
description: Create short, memorable URLs for easier sharing and tracking.
